reviews.text: Much improved after recent update. Signage board for trains are very good.
It's a good station, but if you need a toilet you have to go back out of the barrier, there is no toilet on the platform, or wait until the train is in and go on the train

A big thank you to Caroline network rail platform staff, my friend Tony who was visiting Liverpool with us when he fell over and hurt his back, Caroline who was working at the station could not have been more helpful, found a wheelchair, helped with the cases. absolutely brilliant. Our gratitude and thanks once again.
A much improved and upgraded railway station. Good facilities on the main concourse.

Do not visit Liverpool without visiting St George's Hall plateau area and marvel at the architecture sights this city has to offer there is more than just the iconic waterfront and nearby museums and central library well worth a visit the city is a cultural gem. Not just football and music enjoy
